descprition: Institute for Liberal Studies Socratic Seminars provide a chance for small groups of students to spend a weekend in discussion on topics such as economics and philosophy, led by a professor with expertise in the subject.
My role in this club includes:
list: Promote and engaged in future event planning.
Build a relationship with faculty and staff members.

descprition: My role in this club includes:
list: Increased the awareness of the Association with students on campus
Developed a team of high capable directors and members
Increased communication between the faculty and the students
Developed a Case Competition at York

descprition: My role in this club includes:
list: Founded a derivative of the Students for Liberty Network.
Maintained relationships with outside organizations and speakers.
